channel.description:
[date=2021-01-09 time=16:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]
**Topic**
## FEP @pukkamustard and @cjs
https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/fep-a4ed-the-fediverse-enhancement-proposal-process/1171/2
which started probably here: https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/fediverse-enhancement-proposal-fep/1059:
- https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/fep-a4edc7b-the-fediverse-enhancement-proposal-process/1090 @pukkamustard
- https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/proposal-mechanism-for-synchronizing-followers-lists-across-servers/852 @Claire
- https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/come-help-list-of-feps-needed/1097 @cjs
- the [FEP Index](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/pub/fediverse-enhancement-proposals#index)
… …
--- `<personalOpinion>` and there were many things **many** people wanted to talk about in 2020 but were censored due to “time constraints” - I could understand if users like @nedjo who gave us all the nice thoughts and writings are very disappointed. I would like to talk 12 hours this time. `</personalOpinion>`
# The waitlist
--- ## alsoKnownAs and Link Relations
Following up on https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/defining-alsoknownas/907/9 @rhiaro but also on the [adhoc discussion in SocialCG IRC](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/2020-12-04-socialcg-meeting/1166/2) [sorry for the mess]
---
## Structure of W3C Social CG and official site
- guides - site [**Please see Look and feel**](https://rigelk.gitlab.io/activitypub.rocks/) by @rigelk - wiki - OpenCollective - Official fediverse account (some days ago made https://gup.pe/u/activitypub for rC3) - fediverse.space
@how asked “Is there a way to communicate to W3C that promoting decentralization and using Microsoft services are antithetical?” /me added “and using google captcha and putting forms what a computer thinks we do and not giving the community space and getting EFF back in the boat and …”
---
## Building the Policy Group 16 people want to join the Policy Group, we need a meeting time, how to ?
---
## Fediverse Futures agree to @aschrijver
> AFAIK the Fediverse Futures group has not been followed-up on.
Here is a diferent twist :) https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/fediverse-futures-visions-dreams-feedback-wanted/1238
related: We want to talk about how we can make our clients work together and how we get generic servers so that users content does not get lost and that we do not have our life fragmented between 9 services (for example here mastodon.social [sl007], chaos.social [redaktor], octodon.social [secret], conf.tube [apconf], pixelfed.social [apconf], gup.pe [activitypub], redaktor alpha, immers.space [sl007], funkwhale etc.)
---
# The not existing official Test Suite and making the inofficial an official
We wanted to talk about that in 3 different Social CGs but it whas concensus that we do not have time. November 19 https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/the-activitypub-test-suite/290 July 2020 – A heavy thank you @cjs for “Just Do It!” https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/unofficial-test-suite-go-fed-testsuite/805/5
and now: How does it become official? The lack is a very hindering reason for some of us ;) There is also [FediDB](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/introducing-fedidb-devtools-for-activitypub/660/6) by @dansup
After that: Somebody but not CJ, dansup or me *should* answer the [80 questions](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/search?q=test) about this …
---
# Generic Server for diverse clients
We wanted to talk about generic servers. It is only solvable by talking to each other. pleroma: @lanodan and https://web.immers.space 3D: @datatitian and @birdsofpraise and @loweel@boseburo.ddns.net and @marius
[related 1](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/extensible-client-to-server-applications/341) [related 2](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/want-to-build-an-activitypub-client-where-to-start/993) more related [100 posts](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/search?q=client)
thank you, by random I noticed a solution to a "bug", mastodon makes `preferredUsername` a MUST :: ¯\\__(ツ)_/¯
---
# Making [Hashtag an extension](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/topics-and-services-we-can-subscribe-to/995/4) as Chris noted for the first November meeting, we should talk about this https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/topics-and-services-we-can-subscribe-to/995/4
---
# Groups in AP is, what we should also talk about …
@grishka and @ngerakines
---
btw: I do not remember the elder things we promised to talk about, but did not, so I stop here.
--- **Wiki**
[sorry, no preview available, unable cause "wgIsProbablyEditable":false ] https://www.w3.org/wiki/SocialCG
[date=2021-01-09 time=16:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]
# Join the meeting everybody: ### [Join via jitsi](https://meet.jit.si/ScatteredConsequencesActRegardless) – chat and vote in #social on freenode: [Web Chat](https://webchat.freenode.net/#social)
---
`<personalOpinion>` 1 hour is ridiculuous – *the list goes on and on and on* P.S - [funkwhale is looking for new maintainers](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/funkwhale-is-looking-for-new-maintainers/1140) - [fediverse.space is looking for somebody to overtake]() - [vote amy](https://rhiaro.co.uk/2020/11/tag-statement)
Personally I would be interested if we can break free from clones of hypercapitalist services because I do not like kings. If we can begin to use ActivityPub as described in the specification and use the users server with diverse clients. Personally I do not have any interest in the data of my users. A client is fine for me. `</personalOpinion>`

item.title: 2021-01-09 SocialCG Meeting - FEP
item.dc:creator: rhiaro
item.description:
Thanks, @Sebastian, for keeping track of the meeting topics waitlist for all of this time.

Perhaps we can set a meeting schedule including each topic, for coming months, so we know they won’t get pushed back forever? We could alternate Fridays and Saturdays, since we haven’t managed to fix a preference for everyone who wants to get involved. I can write a draft schedule to start with, arbitrarily assigning topics to dates, and anyone who wants to swap them around to make sure they can attend meetings of particular interest can ask to do so. Does that sound like a reasonable step forward?

Also keep in mind, some of these topics can be progressed in between meetings and while we wait for a designated meeting to come up. So don’t feel like a distant meeting means work is ‘paused’. It’s best if we do as much as possible asynchronously anyway.
